title: Blue Essence Crafting Use?
body: So basically just wondering if there will Riot plans to implement another use for blue essence in crafting, owning every champion and getting champions gets pretty frustrating, but if you could turn them into blue essence and use that for something else or even convert it to IP I think it would be useful as I know a fair few people own most champs already. Comment any ideas you think would be useful to be able to spend blue essence on and hopefully rito notice.

replies.body: What would be the point in converting it to ip if you already have all the champs ?
Blue essence can be used together with mastery tokens to reach mastery tiers 6 and 7, which people should earn more of if they own more champs.

At the moment you need the blue essence (or the champion shard if you have it) to upgrade to mastery tiers 6 and 7. There may very well be future plans for this kinda thing, but I think some kind of IP sink would be sooner considered than another blue essence sink atm since it's harder to get than IP,
